00049 /*============================================================================*/
00050 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */

00053 /*
00054  * Initial delay between the timeout_thread and silence_thread
00055  * (in LLP_TIME_TICKs).
00056  */
00057 #define TIMEOUT_THREAD_DELAY    (0.5)
00058 
00059 /* 
00060  * Time that the timeout thread will sleep (in LLP_TIME_TICKs).
00061  */
00062 #define TIMEOUT_THREAD_SLEEP    (1)
00063 
00064 /* 
00065  * Time that the silence thread will sleep (in LLP_TIME_TICKs).
00066  */
00067 #define SILENCE_THREAD_SLEEP    (1)
00068 
00069 /* 
00070  * Time that the monitor thread will sleep (in LLP_TIME_TICKS).
00071  */
00072 #define MONITOR_THREAD_SLEEP    (10)
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * Thread that will listen in UDP socket.
00076  */
00077 static pthread_t listen_thread;
00078 
00079 /*
00080  * Thread that will do session timeout and expiration management
00081  */
00082 static pthread_t timeout_thread;
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * Thread that will do keep-alive management.
00086  */
00087 static pthread_t silence_thread;
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * Thread that will monitor cache rate and number of active sessions.
00091  */
00092 static pthread_t monitor_thread;
00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Mutex used by condition variable timeout_condition.
00096  */
00097 static pthread_mutex_t timeout_mutex;
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Mutex used by condition variable silence_condition.
00101  */
00102 static pthread_mutex_t silence_mutex;
00103 
00104 /*
00105  * Mutex used by condition variable monitor_condition.
00106  */
00107 static pthread_mutex_t monitor_mutex;
00108 
00109 /*
00110  * Contidion variable used by timeout_thread
00111  */
00112 static pthread_cond_t timeout_condition;
00113 
00114 /*
00115  * Condition variable used by silence_thread.
00116  */
00117 static pthread_cond_t silence_condition;
00118 
00119 /*
00120  * Condition variable used by monitor_thread.
00121  */
00122 static pthread_cond_t monitor_condition;
00123 
00124 static int finish_execution = 0;
00125

00127 /* Private functions prototypes.                                              */

00130 /*
00131  * Function to be executed by the listen_thread.
00132  */
00133 static void *run_listen_socket();
00134 
00135 /*
00136  * Function to be executed by timeout_thread.
00137  */
00138 static void *timer_handle_timeouts();
00139 
00140 /*
00141  * Function to be executed by silence_thread.
00142  */
00143 static void *timer_handle_silence();
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * Function to be executed by monitor_thread.
00147  */
00148 static void *timer_monitor();
00149 
00150 /*
00151  * Computes the time that a thread must sleep.
00152  */
00153 static inline void thread_sleep(float sleep, pthread_cond_t *condition,
00154                 pthread_mutex_t *mutex);

00156 /*============================================================================*/
00157 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00158 /*============================================================================*/
00159 
00160 int llp_create_threads() {
00161 
00162         if (pthread_mutex_init(&timeout_mutex, NULL)) {
00163                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating mutex: %s.", strerror(errno));
00164                 return LLP_ERROR;
00165         }
00166         
00167         if (pthread_mutex_init(&silence_mutex, NULL)) {
00168                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating mutex: %s.", strerror(errno));
00169                 return LLP_ERROR;
00170         }
00171         
00172         if (pthread_mutex_init(&monitor_mutex, NULL)) {
00173                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating mutex: %s.", strerror(errno));
00174                 return LLP_ERROR;
00175         }
00176         
00177         if (pthread_cond_init(&timeout_condition, NULL)) {
00178                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating condition variable: %s.",
00179                                 strerror(errno));
00180                 return LLP_ERROR;
00181         }
00182 
00183         if (pthread_cond_init(&silence_condition, NULL)) {
00184                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating condition variable: %s.",
00185                                 strerror(errno));
00186                 return LLP_ERROR;
00187         }
00188         
00189         if (pthread_cond_init(&monitor_condition, NULL)) {
00190                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating condition variable: %s.",
00191                                 strerror(errno));
00192                 return LLP_ERROR;
00193         }
00194 
00195         /* Thread to listen packets. */
00196         if (pthread_create(&listen_thread, NULL, run_listen_socket, NULL)) {
00197                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating thread: %s.", strerror(errno));
00198                 return LLP_ERROR;
00199         }
00200 
00201         /* Thread to handle session timeout and expiration. */
00202         if (pthread_create(&timeout_thread, NULL, timer_handle_timeouts, NULL)) {
00203                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating thread: %s.", strerror(errno));
00204                 return LLP_ERROR;
00205         }
00206         
00207         /* Thread to handle session keep-alive. */
00208         if (pthread_create(&silence_thread, NULL, timer_handle_silence, NULL)) {
00209                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating thread: %s.", strerror(errno));
00210                 return LLP_ERROR;
00211         }
00212         
00213         /* Thread to monitor cache fill rate and number of connections. */
00214         if (pthread_create(&monitor_thread, NULL, timer_monitor, NULL)) {
00215                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating thread: %s.", strerror(errno));
00216                 return LLP_ERROR;
00217         }
00218         
00219         finish_execution = 0;
00220         
00221         return LLP_OK;
00222 }
00223 /******************************************************************************/
00224 void llp_destroy_threads() {
00225         
00226         finish_execution = 1;
00227         
00228         pthread_cond_broadcast(&silence_condition);
00229         pthread_cond_broadcast(&timeout_condition);
00230         pthread_cond_broadcast(&monitor_condition);
00231 
00232         pthread_join(silence_thread, NULL);
00233         pthread_join(timeout_thread, NULL);
00234         pthread_join(monitor_thread, NULL);
00235 
00236         pthread_mutex_destroy(&silence_mutex);
00237         pthread_mutex_destroy(&timeout_mutex);
00238         pthread_mutex_destroy(&monitor_mutex);
00239         pthread_cond_destroy(&silence_condition);
00240         pthread_cond_destroy(&timeout_condition);
00241         pthread_cond_destroy(&monitor_condition);
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*============================================================================*/
00245 /* Private functions prototypes.                                              */
00246 /*============================================================================*/
00247 
00248 void *run_listen_socket() {
00249 
00250         llp_listen_socket();
00251         pthread_exit(NULL);
00252                 
00253         return LLP_OK;
00254 }
00255 /******************************************************************************/
00256 void *timer_handle_timeouts() {
00257         
00258         /* Initial delay between threads. */
00259         pthread_mutex_lock(&timeout_mutex);
00260         thread_sleep(TIMEOUT_THREAD_SLEEP, &timeout_condition, &timeout_mutex);
00261 
00262         while (1) {
00263                 if (finish_execution == 1) {
00264                         pthread_exit(NULL);
00265                 }
00266                 llp_handle_timeouts();
00267                 thread_sleep(TIMEOUT_THREAD_SLEEP, &timeout_condition,
00268                                 &timeout_mutex);
00269     }
00270 
00271         return LLP_OK;
00272 }
00273 /******************************************************************************/
00274 void *timer_handle_silence() {
00275         
00276         pthread_mutex_lock(&silence_mutex);
00277         while (1) {
00278                 if (finish_execution == 1) {
00279                         pthread_exit(NULL);
00280                 }
00281                 llp_handle_silence();
00282                 thread_sleep(SILENCE_THREAD_SLEEP, &silence_condition, 
00283                                 &silence_mutex);
00284     }
00285     
00286     return LLP_OK;
00287 }
00288 /******************************************************************************/
00289 void *timer_monitor() {
00290         
00291         pthread_mutex_lock(&monitor_mutex);
00292         while (1) {
00293                 if (finish_execution == 1) {
00294                         pthread_exit(NULL);
00295                 }
00296                 llp_handle_nodes();
00297                 llp_handle_connections();
00298                 thread_sleep(MONITOR_THREAD_SLEEP, &monitor_condition,
00299                                 &monitor_mutex);
00300     }
00301     
00302     return LLP_OK;
00303 }
00304 /******************************************************************************/
00305 void thread_sleep(float sleep, pthread_cond_t *condition,
00306                 pthread_mutex_t *mutex) {
00307         struct timeval time;
00308         struct timespec delay;
00309 
00310         gettimeofday(&time, NULL);
00311 
00312         delay.tv_nsec = time.tv_usec * 1000 +
00313                                 (((long)(LLP_TIME_TICK*sleep)) % 1000) * 1000 * 1000;
00314 
00315         /* If nsec is bigger than a second. */
00316         if (delay.tv_nsec > 1000000000) {
00317                 delay.tv_sec = time.tv_sec + delay.tv_nsec / 1000000000 +
00318                                 ((long)(LLP_TIME_TICK*sleep)) / 1000;
00319                 delay.tv_nsec %= 1000000000;
00320 
00321         } else {
00322                 delay.tv_sec = time.tv_sec + (LLP_TIME_TICK*sleep) / 1000;
00323         }
00324         
00325         pthread_cond_timedwait(condition, mutex, &delay);
00326 }
